name: Dynomite!
summary: It's prehistoric egg-blasting fun! Use your slingshot to match three or more dino eggs of the same color... and watch them explode! Can you blast all the eggs before Mama Brontosaurus tramples your game?
info:
• 中文名: 恐龙蛋
  • 开发: PopCap Games
  • 发行: Electronic Arts
  • 平台: PC/WP
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2002年4月18日
